availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Hugh S. Hickman (Harrison County, KY, carpenter)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, carpenter. Maryland native. Married to Sarah A. Holton Hickman in Harrison County, Kentucky, on July 7, 1821. Father of Augustus Hickman, Nicholas Hickman, Benjamin Hickman, and Lucy Hickman. Carpenter in Harrison County in 1850. Retiree in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 56A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 658.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Harrison County Marriages, Film 000216881, p. 146.
"Hugh Smith Dunn Hickman (1796-1872)," Find A Grave, Memorial 49103542, accessed January 28, 2024, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/49103542.
